dialogue.name: RESISTANCECOUNCILOR
dialogue.text: Blade Surname. Might I have a word?

dialogue.name: RESISTANCECOUNCILOR
dialogue.text: Your valiant efforts on the battlefield continue to prove an ideal to which all of our soldiers aspire. After conferring with my superiors, they asked that you be made privy to the Resistance's highest accolades.

dialogue.name: RESISTANCECOUNCILOR
dialogue.text: They are decorations awarded only to our most valiant soldiers, blessed to grant their wearers protection from those who would bring ruin to Bozja.

dialogue.name: RESISTANCECOUNCILOR
dialogue.text: Few are those who possess the mettle to qualify for evaluation, but we believe you, Blade Surname, may be worthy of this most prestigious of honors.

dialogue.name: RESISTANCECOUNCILOR
dialogue.text: Players who are awarded Resistance honors will be granted increased attributes when undertaking duties in Save the Queen content.

dialogue.name: RESISTANCECOUNCILOR
dialogue.text: A large amount of mettle must be amassed to be rewarded Resistance honors. Furthermore, it should be noted that no rewards other than an increase to attributes will be granted.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Submit to evaluation for Resistance honors?

dialogue.name: RESISTANCECOUNCILOR
dialogue.text: Very good. We shall be observing your exploits in the field with great interest, Blade Surname.

dialogue.name: RESISTANCECOUNCILOR
dialogue.text: When you believe yourself ready to receive of our honors, come and speak with me, and I will evaluate your performance accordingly.

dialogue.name: RESISTANCECOUNCILOR
dialogue.text: You have unlocked Resistance honors. There are three types of honors, each of which increases various character attributes.

dialogue.name: RESISTANCECOUNCILOR
dialogue.text: To receive Resistance honors, you must first amass sufficient mettle and speak with the Resistance councilor to receive proofs of mettle. These may then be exchanged for honors of your choosing. You can speak with the Resistance councilor at any time to learn more about Resistance honors.
